about.title: About Me
about.description: Front-end developer with experience in React, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS. Passionate about creating dynamic and efficient web interfaces, I stand out for my focus on continuous learning and creative problem-solving. I'm excited to kickstart my professional career and contribute innovative solutions to meaningful projects.

proyects.school-d: This school management project allows students to organize their tasks, teachers to assign and grade, and administrators to manage users. Additionally, it includes authentication systems, subject assignment, and grade visualization.
proyects.notes-d: This project is a web application developed with React that allows users to manage their notes easily and intuitively. The application uses Vite to optimize its performance and Tailwind CSS for a modern and responsive design.
proyects.calculator-d: This project involves the development of a functional calculator using React, designed to perform basic mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
